name: The Legend of Siren Head
description:
- Backstory -

The year is 1998. You are a journalist named Samuel Miller. Intrigued by a series of disappearances in Wychwood Forest, Oxfordshire, you have taken it upon yourself to investigate and document the cause of them and to see if the rumours are true once and for all.

- Controls -

A & D - Move left and right

E - Interact

Shift - Sprint

- Credits -

Character art: https://rvros.itch.io/

Environment art: https://edermunizz.itch.io/

^ Thank-you to these awesome people for providing amazing art for the game! ^

Thank-you for playing! You can learn more about Siren Head HERE.

Please consider donating! You don't have to, but it will really help me out with my future projects! :)
